https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y4pIO7MOGrtF4Oy1rYLeCEbso1z.jpg Will Shortz (editor of the New York Times crossword puzzle) tests his own limits of commitment, and his brains ability to be fully activated, by pledging to play ping pong every day for a year. A Year of Ping Pong
